admreg: East Asia and Pacific,East Asia and Pacific
trustfund:
TF036673-SOUTH EAST ASIA REGION -
            EDUCATION PROJECTS (VIETNAM AND CAMBODIA)

abstracts.cdata!:
The outcome of the project was highly
            satisfactory, and likewise its sustainability. The lessons
            reinforce once again, that simple project design, and
            careful assessment of the implementation agencies at the
            earliest stages, facilitates project success. It is further
            stated that institutional capacity enhances implementation,
            as shown by the borrower's procurement agency, whose
            knowledge of the Bank's procurement procedures greatly
            benefited implementation. The diffusion of project
            equipment, made available to outside institutions,
            universities, private organizations, and industries,
            resulted in high equipment utilization rates, thus
            generating impressive numbers of research works, and
            publications, as well as supplemental income for future
            operation and maintenance funds of equipment.
